markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 3" pfs="Limited">[Electrified Crystal Ward](/Spells.aspx?ID=561)</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Age of Ashes</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Electricity" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=56" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #148: Fires of the Haunted City](/Sources.aspx?ID=13) pg. 75</row>

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** touch

**Target** 1 hinge or latch
</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You create an [_electric latch rune_](/Hazards.aspx?ID=5) hazard on the target, creating a special crystalline lock on the object. You can also substitute your spell DC for any of the hazard’s listed DCs. You can have only one such hazard active at a time, and if you cast this spell while a previous _electric latch rune_ is active, the older hazard discharges harmlessly.

---
**Heightened (+2)** The hazard’s damage increases by 1d12.
name: Electrified Crystal Ward

You can have only one such hazard active at a time, and if you cast this spell while a previous electric latch rune is active, the older hazard discharges harmlessly. --- Heightened (+2) The hazard’s damage increases by 1d12.
